media.headline: Giants' Opening Day lineup
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Bochy, Giants' Opening Day lineup introduced
media.bigblurb: Manager Bruce Bochy and the Giants' starting lineup are introduced on Opening Day in Arizona

media.headline: D-backs starters introduced
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Lovullo, D-backs starters introduced
media.bigblurb: Manager Torey Lovullo and the D-backs' starting lineup are introduced before they take on the Giants on Opening Day in Arizona

media.headline: Greinke's first pitch of 2017
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Greinke tosses strike for first pitch of 2017
media.bigblurb: Zack Greinke gets the D-backs' season underway with a strike to Denard Span to start the top of the 1st inning

media.headline: Trent Harmon sings anthem
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Trent Harmon sings national anthem
media.bigblurb: Country music star Trent Harmon, winner of the 15th season of American Idol, sings the national anthem before the D-backs host the Giants

media.headline: Bumgarner fans the side in 2nd
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Bumgarner strikes out the side in the 2nd
media.bigblurb: Madison Bumgarner strikes out the side in order in the bottom of the 2nd inning

media.headline: Panik's sacrifice fly
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Panik plates Giants' first run with a sac fly
media.bigblurb: Joe Panik lifts a sacrifice fly to center field, scoring Eduardo Nunez to give the Giants a 1-0 lead

media.headline: Kristen Lovullo on Opening Day
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Kristen Lovullo on her husband's new job
media.bigblurb: Kristen Lovullo discusses her husband Torey spending his first Opening Day as manager of the D-backs

media.headline: Bumgarner's solo smash
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Bumgarner helps own cause, belts solo homer
media.bigblurb: Madison Bumgarner helps himself by launching a solo home run to left, giving the Giants a 2-0 lead in the 5th inning

media.headline: D-backs discuss Greinke's humor
media.blurb: SF@ARI: D-backs players weigh in on Greinke's humor
media.bigblurb: Zack Greinke's D-backs teammates discuss his personality and unique sense of humor

media.headline: Nunez's RBI single
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Nunez plates Crawford with a single to center
media.bigblurb: Eduardo Nunez grounds a single to center field, scoring Brandon Crawford in the 6th inning with his third hit of the game

media.headline: Mathis nabs Nunez after review
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Nunez ruled out at third after review in 6th
media.bigblurb: Eduardo Nunez is ruled safe on a steal attempt in the 6th inning, and after the D-backs challenge, Nunez is ruled out at third base

media.headline: Mathis breaks up perfect game
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Mathis triples to break up perfect-game bid
media.bigblurb: Jeff Mathis hits a triple to left field, breaking up Madison Bumgarner's bid for a perfect game in the bottom of the 6th inning

media.headline: Pollock's two-run homer
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Pollock belts a two-run homer in the 6th
media.bigblurb: A.J. Pollock launches a two-run homer to left off Madison Bumgarner in the 6th, tying the game at 3

media.headline: Bumgarner's second homer
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Bumgarner crushes his second homer of game
media.bigblurb: Madison Bumgarner crushes a solo home run to left, becoming the first pitcher ever to homer twice on Opening Day

media.headline: Ahmed's RBI single
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Ahmed plates Mathis with a single to right
media.bigblurb: Nick Ahmed lines a single to right field, scoring Jeff Mathis to put the D-backs on the board in the 6th inning

media.headline: Chafin nabs Span, call stands
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Chafin nabs Span at first after review in 7th
media.bigblurb: Andrew Chafin picks off Denard Span at first base in the top of the 7th, and after the Giants challenge, the out call stands

media.headline: Goldschmidt's game-tying single
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Goldschmidt hits a game-tying single in 8th
media.bigblurb: Paul Goldschmidt grounds an RBI single to left field, plating A.J. Pollock to tie the game at 4 in the 8th inning

media.headline: Young fan shows off toy truck
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Young Giants fan brandishes his toy truck
media.bigblurb: A young Giants fan displays his toy truck for the camera on Opening Day at Chase Field

media.headline: Gillaspie's go-ahead sac fly
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Gillaspie plates Panik with a sac fly in 9th
media.bigblurb: Conor Gillaspie hits a sacrifice fly to A.J. Pollock in center, scoring Joe Panik to give the Giants a 5-4 lead in the 9th inning

media.headline: Descalso ties the game in 9th
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Descalso lines a game-tying single in the 9th
media.bigblurb: Daniel Descalso lines a single to center field, scoring Jeremy Hazelbaker to tie the game at 5 with two outs in the bottom of the 9th

media.headline: Owings' walk-off RBI single
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Owings lines a walk-off RBI single in the 9th
media.bigblurb: Chris Owings lines a single to right field, scoring Daniel Descalso to give the D-backs the walk-off win in the bottom of the 9th

media.headline: Statcast: Bumgarner belts two
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Statcast measures Bumgarner's two home runs
media.bigblurb: Statcast measures the exit velocity, launch angle and projected hang time of Madison Bumgarner's historic Opening Day home runs

media.headline: Owings on his walk-off hit
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Owings gets doused after his walk-off single
media.bigblurb: Chris Owings discusses his walk-off RBI single and gets a celebratory shower from his teammates following a 6-5 win on Opening Day

media.headline: Rodney strands the bases loaded
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Rodney retires Crawford to escape jam in 9th
media.bigblurb: With the bases loaded, Fernando Rodney induces a chopper in front of the plate and Jeff Mathis steps on home to end the top of the 9th

media.headline: Panik's diving stop
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Panik dives to make a tough stop in the 9th
media.bigblurb: Joe Panik lays out to make a stop on a grounder up the middle and fires to first base for the out in the 9th

media.headline: Giants turn two in 8th
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Panik, Crawford turn a double play in the 8th
media.bigblurb: Joe Panik makes the stop on a grounder and tosses to Brandon Crawford to start a key 4-6-3 double play in the 8th inning

media.headline: Hoover fans Hernandez
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Hoover strikes out Hernandez in the 8th
media.bigblurb: J.J. Hoover strikes out Gorkys Hernandez swinging to end the top of the 8th inning

media.headline: Bumgarner's first strikeout
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Bumgarner fans Owings for his first K of 2017
media.bigblurb: Madison Bumgarner strikes out Chris Owings swinging in the 1st inning for his first strikeout of the season

media.headline: Greinke induces popup, ends 1st
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Greinke retires Crawford to end the 1st
media.bigblurb: Zack Greinke coaxes a popout to first base from Brandon Crawford to end the 1st inning, stranding runners on first and second base

media.headline: Greinke's first K of 2017
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Greinke strikes out Posey for first K of 2017
media.bigblurb: Zack Greinke strikes out Buster Posey looking for the second out of the 1st inning, collecting his first strikeout of the 2017 season

media.headline: Must C: Bumgarner homers twice
media.blurb: Must C Classic: Bumgarner homers twice on Opening Day
media.bigblurb: Madison Bumgarner becomes the first pitcher in the history of baseball to hit two home runs in a game on Opening Day

media.headline: Pollock's diving grab
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Pollock lays out to make the grab in center
media.bigblurb: A.J. Pollock lays out to make the catch on a sinking line drive off the bat of Conor Gillaspie in the 9th and limit the Giants' scoring

media.headline: Bumgarner's historic Opening Day
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Bumgarner homers twice, K's 11 on Opening Day
media.bigblurb: Giants ace Madison Bumgarner strikes out 11 D-backs in seven innings, while becoming the first pitcher to homer twice on Opening Day

media.headline: Lovullo on Opening Day win
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Lovullo discusses dramatic walk-off win
media.bigblurb: D-backs manager Torey Lovullo discusses his team's dramatic 6-5 walk-off Opening Day win against the Giants

media.headline: Greinke on Opening Day outing
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Greinke on his Opening Day start
media.bigblurb: Zack Greinke talks about his start on Opening Day and the D-backs' walk-off win vs. the Giants

media.headline: Must C: D-backs stun Giants
media.blurb: Must C Clutch: D-backs rally for the win in the 9th
media.bigblurb: Chris Owings singles home Daniel Descalso to cap off a 9th-inning rally, pushing the D-backs to a 6-5 victory on Opening Day

media.headline: Statcast: Pollock's diving catch
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Statcast measures Pollock's catch probability
media.bigblurb: Statcast measures A.J. Pollock's Opening Day diving catch vs. the Giants

media.headline: Recap: SF 5, ARI 6
media.blurb: 4/2/17: Owings helps D-backs walk off on Opening Day
media.bigblurb: Daily Recap: Madison Bumgarner homered twice, but the D-backs came from behind three times to set up Chris Owings' walk-off hit in the 9th

media.headline: Melancon's first K with Giants
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Melancon records first strikeout with Giants
media.bigblurb: Facing his first batter in a Giants uniform, Mark Melancon gets Brandon Drury to swing through a fastball for a strikeout

media.headline: 4/2/17 CG: SF@ARI
media.blurb: 4/2/17 Condensed Game: SF@ARI
media.bigblurb: 4/2/17 Condensed Game: SF@ARI

media.headline: Bumgarner on two-homer game
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Bumgarner discusses historic two-homer game
media.bigblurb: Madison Bumgarner talks about becoming the first pitcher to hit two home runs on Opening Day

media.headline: Melancon on blown save
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Melancon on first blown save for the Giants
media.bigblurb: Mark Melancon discusses his disappointment after spoiling Madison Bumgarner's stellar start

media.headline: Bochy on 6-5 loss to D-backs
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Bochy talks about tough loss to D-backs
media.bigblurb: Giants manager Bruce Bochy talks about the tough Opening Day loss to the D-backs

media.headline: Bumgarner's 11 K's in 11 seconds
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Bumgarner's 11 strikeouts in 11 seconds
media.bigblurb: Watch all 11 of Madison Bumgarner's strikeouts vs. the D-backs in 11 seconds

media.headline: Bumgarner's historic homers
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Bumgarner belts two homers on Opening Day
media.bigblurb: Madison Bumgarner launches a pair of solo home runs, becoming the first pitcher in MLB history to homer twice on Opening Day

media.headline: Bumgarner strikes out 11
media.blurb: SF@ARI: Bumgarner strikes out 11 over seven innings
media.bigblurb: Madison Bumgarner retires the first 16 batters he faces and strikes out 11 batters over seven innings of three-run ball
